Name: Dragon Tie
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Gible, Gabite, and Garchomp.  You can get a Dragon Tie at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Gible Fang, a Gible Card, and a Dragon Jewel. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
